alert.note: Alert for Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 2:22AM MDT until March 31 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 4 inches. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel on Highway 14 over the Bighorn mountains will likely be difficult with snow covered and slick road conditions and poor visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Be prepared for slick and snow covered roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
